title: User Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Enter a valid email address
Enter a valid password meeting criteria
Submit the registration form
Registration is successful, user is redirected or logged in
User role is set to 'customer' by default

title: User Registration with Invalid Data
description: Verify registration fails with invalid email format or weak password.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Enter invalid email formats (e.g., missing '@' symbol)
Enter weak passwords (e.g., too short)
Attempt to submit the registration form
Display validation error messages preventing registration
User is not registered

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Verify that a registered user can login successfully using valid email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid registered email and password
Submit the login form
User is logged in and redirected to the homepage or profile page
Session is created and persisted

title: User Login with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login failure when incorrect email or password is provided.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter unregistered email or incorrect password
Submit the login form
Error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials
User is not logged in

title: Admin Role Access Verification
description: Verify that users with admin role can access the admin dashboard and restricted features.

steps.description: Login as an admin user
Navigate to the admin dashboard URL
Admin dashboard loads successfully
Attempt to perform admin tasks such as creating products, offers, managing users
Admin functionalities are accessible and functional

title: Customer Role Access Restriction to Admin Dashboard
description: Verify customers cannot access the admin dashboard or perform admin-only operations.

steps.description: Login as a normal customer user
Attempt to navigate to the admin dashboard URL
Access is denied or redirected to unauthorized page
Attempt to perform admin operations via API endpoints
Requests are rejected with appropriate authorization error

title: Browse Product Catalog and Filter Products
description: Verify users can browse product catalog, apply filters, and the list updates correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to products listing page
Apply filters such as categories, sizes, or colors
Products displayed match the selected filter criteria
Clear filters
Product list resets to show all or default products

title: View Product Details and Variant Availability
description: Verify product details page displays all variant options including sizes, colors, stock status and images.

steps.description: Click a product from catalog to open its detail page
Product images gallery loads correctly
All size and color variants are shown
Stock availability is accurately displayed for each variant

title: Add Product Variants to Cart
description: Verify users can add selected product variants with specified quantity to the cart.

steps.description: Select product variant (size, color) and enter a quantity
Click 'Add to Cart' button
Selected items appear in the cart with correct details and quantity
Stock availability is checked before addition

title: Update Quantity of Items in Cart
description: Verify users can update the quantity of items already present in the shopping cart.

steps.description: Go to shopping cart page
Modify the quantity input field for a product item
Trigger update action if needed (e.g. blur or click update)
Cart updates the quantity and recalculates totals
Quantity cannot exceed available stock

title: Remove Item from Cart
description: Verify users can remove an item from the shopping cart successfully.

steps.description: Go to shopping cart page
Click 'Remove' or delete icon for an item
Item is removed and cart summary updates accordingly

title: Clear Entire Cart
description: Verify users can clear all items in the cart at once.

steps.description: Go to shopping cart page
Click 'Clear Cart' button or link
Cart is emptied and shows appropriate message for empty cart

title: Proceed to Checkout and Enter Customer Details
description: Verify checkout flow collects all required customer information correctly.

steps.description: Click 'Checkout' from cart page with items in cart
Enter customer details such as name, phone number, shipping address
Form validations enforce mandatory fields and correct formats
Submit checkout form

title: Checkout Order Placement via WhatsApp Integration
description: Verify that placing an order sends the order details through WhatsApp successfully.

steps.description: Complete valid customer details and submit order
WhatsApp is prompted or opened with correct formatted message containing order details
Order is recorded in system with pending status

title: Order Status Update and User Order Tracking
description: Verify that order statuses update properly and are reflected correctly in user order history and account pages.

steps.description: Place an order as a customer
Admin updates the order status via dashboard
User order history shows updated status in real time or on refresh
User views updated order details and tracking info

title: Invoice Generation for Single and Multiple Orders
description: Verify invoices are generated correctly with accurate data for single and bulk order processing.

steps.description: Place a single order and generate invoice
Invoice shows correct product info, customer details, pricing, taxes, and total
Generate invoices for multiple orders from admin dashboard
Invoices for all selected orders are created with accurate data

title: Create, Edit, and Delete Products from Admin Dashboard
description: Verify admin users can manage products fully via the dashboard including variant and stock management.

steps.description: Login as admin and navigate to products management page
Create a new product with multiple variants, images, and stock
New product appears in catalog with correct info
Edit existing product details and variant stock quantities
Changes are saved and reflected to users
Delete a product and confirm removal
Product is no longer visible in system

title: Create and Apply Offers with Different Discount Types
description: Verify admin can create and users can apply coupon offers (percentage, fixed, BOGO) accurately during checkout.

steps.description: Admin creates offers with percentage discount, fixed amount, and BOGO types
Offers are listed and active in system
User applies each offer type in cart or checkout
Discounts are correctly applied and calculated in totals
Invalid or expired coupons are rejected with proper error

title: Admin User Management Functions
description: Verify admin can view, add, edit, and remove users from the admin dashboard.

steps.description: Login as admin and open user management page
Add a new user with customer role
New user is listed with correct info
Edit user details or roles
Updated user information is saved
Delete a user and confirm removal
User is no longer in the system

title: Real-Time Stock Update on Order Placement and Cancellation
description: Verify stock levels update immediately and correctly on new order creation and order cancellation.

steps.description: Submit a new order for a product variant
Variant stock quantity decreases by ordered amount
Cancel or rollback order from admin dashboard
Variant stock quantity restores to previous level, preventing overselling

title: Homepage Hero Carousel Functionality
description: Verify the image carousel on the homepage cycles through images and user can navigate manually.

steps.description: Navigate to homepage
Hero carousel displays images correctly
Use navigation controls (arrows, dots) to move carousel
Images transition appropriately and smoothly

title: Navigation Header, Cart Icon, and User Menu Behavior
description: Verify header components display correctly and respond to user interactions.

steps.description: Load homepage or any page with header
Navigation links are visible and correct
Click cart icon opens cart page or mini cart
User menu displays login or profile options based on auth status

title: Access Static Informational Pages
description: Verify informational pages (FAQ, Contact, Shipping, Returns, Privacy Policy, Terms) are accessible and display correct content.

steps.description: Navigate to each static informational page via footer or direct URL
Page loads successfully with accurate and complete information

title: API Health Check Endpoint
description: Verify the health check API responds with expected status and data.

steps.description: Send GET request to the health check API endpoint
Response status code is 200 OK
Response body contains indications of API health status

title: Rate Limiting and Logging Utilities Functionality
description: Verify that API requests are rate limited appropriately and logging captures important events.

steps.description: Send rapid successive API requests exceeding rate limit
Excess requests are rejected or delayed with proper error codes
Trigger API events to generate logs
Logs contain necessary information for debugging and monitoring
